name: The Adventure Book
description:
The Adventure Book Swipe to survive Live again with the excitement of having your life set by the dice roll. Play this fast pace multiplatform game where you, the adventures, try to crawl out of the dungeon.

Controls

  • Swipe up -> Attack; Collect; Move;
  • Swipe right -> Flee; Collect; Move;
  • Swipe left -> Flee; Collect; Move;

Jogo submetido para a GameJam+ 22/23 #gamejamplus
Temas da GameJam+:  Back to The Future
Categorias:  Totem;  Product Madness; Social Category GJ+ (Diversity)
